title: San Francisco/SoMa
name: Thirsty Bear Brewing Company
content: Brewpub meets tapas bar.  Good beer brewed in-house, from very light lagers through a nice Kozlov Stout. One or two brews on nitrogen. Very good small-plate food with a Mediterranean / Spanish flair.  Tuesday is cask-ale night - beer served from traditional wood cask instead of modern steel - while it lasts, which usually isn't very long.
